testimonials.text: Great attention to detail. Theo grew into the sharpest coder in the room.

Theo must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that he has not been snapped up at the moment. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh in the field of software and have a small bit of on-the-job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
